title: [Veythorne Manor, Gardens]
description: Raspberry brambles twirl around the massive wrought-iron posts to the north, each obscuring the intricate patterns wrought in the metal and warping them into a strange, organic pattern of miniature loops and curving arcs.  Pale golden blossoms wreath the base of several small linden trees growing along the eastern gate, their sunny hue only enhanced by the patches of daylight peeking through the feathery canopies of the lindens.

Raspberry brambles twirl around the massive wrought-iron posts to the north, each obscuring the intricate patterns wrought in the metal and warping them into a strange, organic pattern of miniature loops and curving arcs.  Pale golden blossoms wreath the base of several small linden trees growing along the eastern gate, their sunny hue muted gently by the wan patches of moonlight peeking through the feathery canopies of the lindens.
